title: Scaffolding-Based Medical Text Analysis and Report Writing Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of medical terminology and medication principles, medical text literacy, and report-writing experience
context.additional_context: Medical education utilizing information technology-based scaffolding accessible via smartphones for practicing professionals. Focuses on improving learners' medical text analysis and report writing skills

learning_goals: Learners identify the credibility of medical information sources by symptom with 80% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners systematically organize the structure and vocabulary of medical case analysis reports using scaffolding tools (templates and online platforms).
Learners logically articulate (verbally/written) drug side-effect response procedures in three or more steps through VR simulation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
